director.name: 弗朗西斯卡·科里奥 Francesca Corio

this_title: MAESTRO, il calcio a colori di Tommaso Maestrelli
introduction: SynopsisThe story of the revolutionary coach Tommaso Maestrelli, a pioneer of what is known as “total football” and a bold dreamer who challenged the domination of the great teams of the North, guiding the Lazio football club, then made up of unknown footballers, to the triumphal win of a historic championship.COMMENTARYThe documentary is not just an overdue tribute to a great man of sports, fifty years after his death, but also a journey across twentieth-century Italy, through a mix of archive films, interviews with experts and the accounts of people who lived through those years. A means to show the key contribution of sports to the evolution of Italian society, mores and culture, with which they are forever entwined.DIRECTOR'S STATEMENTIn this documentary, we tried to present a complete portrait of Maestrelli, from his achievements as a football player, to his actions as a coach, in order to capture his full value and his great humanity. He was not merely one of the forefathers of beauty in football, but a man with a big heart.
